Class PetrinetGraph

gui.PetrinetGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<org.graphstream.graph.Node>, org.graphstream.graph.Element, org.graphstream.graph.Graph, org.graphstream.graph.Structure, org.graphstream.stream.AttributeSink, org.graphstream.stream.ElementSink, org.graphstream.stream.Pipe, org.graphstream.stream.Replayable, org.graphstream.stream.Sink, org.graphstream.stream.Source
public class PetrinetGraph extends org.graphstream.graph.implementations.MultiGraph

A GraphStream graph that can represent an instance of Petrinet.

The graph listens to changes in the petrinet passed to it via a PetrinetComponentChangedListener. If the petrinet is not empty it adds all containing components. Nodes can also be marked / unmarked by toggling them.

  • Method Details

    • toggleNodeMark

      public void toggleNodeMark(PetrinetElement elementToMark)
      Toggle node mark -> mark the node passed if it is has not been selected and unmark the former marked node (if there was one). If the provided node is already marked unmark it. If null is passed unmark the currently marked node.
      Parameters:
      elementToMark - Element for which node should be marked / unmarked (null -> currently marked node is unmarked).

    • getMarkedNode

      public PetrinetElement getMarkedNode()
      Gets the marked node.
      Returns:
      the marked node

    • getElementLabel

      public static String getElementLabel(PetrinetElement element)
      Gets the element label -> for transitions "[id] label" is returned, for places "[id] label <numberOfTokens>" is returned.
      Parameters:
      element - The petrinet element for which to return a label.
      Returns:
      the element label: "[id] label" for transitions, "[id] label <numberOfTokens>" for places
